text: The Monastery of Serra do Pilar was a monastery in Vila Nova de Gaia, Portugal, on the other side of the Douro River from Porto, overlooking the Dom Lu√≠s I Bridge. It was designated a UNESCO World Heritage Site in 1996. The monastery is notable for its church and cloister, both of which are circular. Category:Buildings and structures in Porto Category:World Heritage Sites in Portugal
title: Monastery of Serra do Pilar
